title: Grand Canyon National Park
description: In May 2016 my wife and I took a post-graduation roadtrip to the Grand Canyon.

photos.description: The canyon. A lot of it looks like this, but I liked the outcropping in the foreground.
More canyon. It's very deep and long and wide.
Some flying insect that I spent quite a while trying to get in focus because I refuse to use auto-focus for no real reason other than it's a fun game.
A raven flying over the canyon. If you look at my other photos you'll see a trend of birds in flight.
A raven looking much more magestic sitting in a tree than they do hopping around on the ground eating cheetos that people dropped.
One more canyon shot, but this time with the river.
